sentence.Network_en: I hereby apologize for my regretful incapability exposed last year.
sentence.Network_cn: 非常遗憾地,我的能力缺陷在过去一年中暴露无遗,我在此道歉.

sentence.Network_en: The university bring out all ability including incapability.
sentence.Network_cn: 大学在于可使学生们发挥其所有才能——包括无能.

sentence.Network_en: Westerners believe that self - surrender is incapability.
sentence.Network_cn: 西方人认为忍让是无能.

eg. The dismissal of five workmen caused a strike.incapability 无力pastry 糕点
inattentiveness 注意迟钝incapability 无行为能力incoherence of thinking 思维散漫; 思维不连贯.
is it because their incapability or lacking of the basic resources ?因为他们没有致富的能力或或他们缺乏基本的生活资源。

list.abs: 英语短语搭配 - 豆丁网 ... ignorant of （对……无知） incapable of （没有……的能力） independent of （不受……支配， 不依赖）.
The only regret is , the loose incapable ending lets piece the charm a little lose ., 唯一的遗憾是 , 松散无力的结尾让全片的魅力有点损失.
An employer cannot afford to hire incapable workers ., 一个雇主不能出钱雇用没有能力的工人.
the children seem to be totally incapable of working quietly by themselves ., 这些孩子似乎完全不能安静地自己做功课.

means.word_mean: 2. the quality of not being capable -- physically or intellectually or legally

auth_sentence.content: I need not explain why because you have all proved to be incapable of understanding even your own incapability.
